sentences.en: A few remarks must finally be made concerning the calibration of scintillation detectors.
sentences.cn: 最后需要讲几点关于闪烁探测器校正方面的注意事项.

sentences.en: Density of crystal, transmissivity and scintillation characteristics have been measured.
sentences.cn: 测试了晶体的密度 、 透射率和闪烁性能.

sentences.en: It is sad that I can remember nothing of all this scintillation.
sentences.cn: 遗憾的是,这些妙言隽语我现在都回忆不起来了.

sentences.en: ROTI can be regarded as an indicator of the present of scintillation causing small - scale ionospheric irregularities.
sentences.cn: ROTI可以作为由小尺度不规则结构引起闪烁出现的指示剂.

sentences.en: Scintillation flask method for measuring radon concentration in the air.
sentences.cn: 空气中氡浓度的闪烁瓶测量方法.

sentences.en: Scintillation optical fiber is applied to ray imaging more and more widely.
sentences.cn: 闪烁光纤在射线成像方面的应用越来越广泛.

sentences.en: Seeing is the scintillation of image caused by turbulence in the atmosphere.
sentences.cn: 宁静度是由大气湍流所引起的象的闪烁反射.

sentences.en: The Hermann grid and the scintillation effect.
sentences.cn: 电网的赫尔曼和闪烁的效果.

sentences.en: The most sophisticated technique is scintillation spectrometry.
sentences.cn: 闪烁计数测量法是一顶尖端技术.

sentences.en: The overwhelming loss in counting efficiency occurs during the scintillation process itself.
sentences.cn: 绝大多数计数效率的损失出现在闪烁过程本身.

sentences.en: The radiation intensity through the motor is determined with a scintillation counter.
sentences.cn: 通过发动机的放射强度可用闪光计数器来确定.

sentences.en: The research progress of the scintillators of new generation - the rare - earth scintillation crystals is reviewed.
sentences.cn: 本文综述新一代闪烁体 — 稀土闪烁晶体的进展,介绍其优异的性能以及在测井工作中的应用前景.

sentences.en: The scintillation counter was abandoned for many years.
sentences.cn: 这种闪烁计数器被搁置了有好多年.

sentences.en: The scintillation of the earth's atmosphere prevents this limit from being attained.
sentences.cn: 地球大气的扰动使这一分辨率无法达到.

sentences.en: This review focuses in quenching and quenching correction in liquid scintillation counting.
sentences.cn: 淬灭是存在于液体闪烁测量中最主要的干扰因素.

phrases.tran_cn: [化][医]闪烁计数器；闪炼计数管
闪烁探测器；闪烁计数器

trans.tran_cn: 闪烁（过程或状态），（星辰的）闪烁，（物质中由电离子等造成的）闪烁，一闪
